mapper.select: SELECT * FROM TBL_WISHLIST WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} AND PRODUCT_ID = #{productId}

SELECT TI.IMAGE_ORIGINAL_NAME,TP.PRODUCT_ID,TP.PRODUCT_NAME,TP.PRODUCT_PRICE,TP.PRODUCT_READ_COUNT FROM TBL_WISHLIST TW INNER JOIN TBL_PRODUCT TP ON TP.PRODUCT_ID = TW.PRODUCT_ID INNER JOIN TBL_IMAGES TI on TP.PRODUCT_ID = TI.PRODUCT_ID WHERE MEMBER_ID=#{memberId} AND TI.MAIN_IMAGE = 'Y' ORDER BY TW.WISHLIST_CREATE_DATE DESC
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM TBL_WISHLIST WHERE MEMBER_ID=#{memberId} AND PRODUCT_ID=#{productId}
